Introduction
This topic contains information on handling a claim for apportionment when a Veteran’s award is being offset under 38 U.S.C. 1151 or withheld due to the receipt of separation benefits, including
effect of an offset or withholding of a Veteran’s entire award on a claim for apportionment
actions to take following receipt of a claim for apportionment when a Veteran’s entire award is being offset or withheld
, and
action to take if only part of a Veteran’s award is being offset or withheld
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Apportionment Process
citation: Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
